abstract: The Hunt column on the search by newly divorced father for rental apartment in Manhattan suitable for visits from his daughter; bought large one-bedroom unit in Downtown Brooklyn condominium tower for $541,000.
snippet: Jeff Csoka was ready to try Manhattan city life, but because his daughter often visits him, he was hoping for a place near a park.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Csoka was ready to try Manhattan city life, but because his daughter often visits him, he was hoping for a place near a park.

headline.main: For a Bachelor Father, a Pad With a Pool
headline.seo: The Hunt - For a Bachelor Father, a Pad With a Pool
headline.print_headline: For a Bachelor Father, a Pad With a Pool
